#KeralaFloods: Kerala Government has requested for additional medical teams and setting up of field hospitals. Army is moving medical assets in addition to the 12 teams already deployed. Total of approximately 3000 people have received medical aid till now.

#KeralaFloods: NDRF medical teams established medical camp in affected areas of Distt. Alappuzha and Thrisuur and provided medical aid to104 people. In on-going operation, NDRF has rescued 535 lives & evacuated 24,616 people and rescued 119 livestock.
